ygData.subject: Re: Gnomish Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Great news! Finally something worthwhile... now all i need is a robe and a staff and everyone will think my rogue is a ksing wizard!
ygData.messageBody:
Great news! Finally something worthwhile... now all i need is a robe and a
staff and everyone will think my rogue is a ksing wizard!

At 10:21 AM 12/7/99 +1200, you wrote:
>From: jbuckingham@...
>
>
>
>
>Have been upgraded in the latest patch
>
>If you have no target they operate much like a colored version of the
>magicians
>flare spell - shooting straight outwards as a lightsource until they hit
>terrain.
>Except for the blue one (can't remember which number), which does a little
>circle/spiral. If you have someone targeted when you let them off you see a
>message "<Target> lights a firework", though it always explodes around
>you, in a
>shower of sparks, and it makes an explosion type sound.
>
>I /bugged the fact that they still look like they have a charge after you use
>them though.
>
>Voriig, Gem Chopper and wannabe Gnome Paladin
>
>
